Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Detroit in 1979...
Injured on 5/18/1979 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/26/1979 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...

Injured on 6/22/1987 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1988, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1988...
Injured on 9/4/1989 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1990, going 5-1, 2.33...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/4/1990 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 4/15/1991 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/5/1991 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1991, going 6-0, 1.32...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1992, going 5-0, 1.13...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Detroit in 1992...
